metadata.Title: CVE-2019-19051 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: A memory leak in the i2400m_op_rfkill_sw_toggle() function indrivers/net/wimax/i2400m/op-rfkill.c in the Linux kernel before 5.3.11allows attackers to cause a denial of service (memory consumption), akaCID-6f3ef5c25cc7.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
